title: Chapter 5: Bridging AI Agents to ROS 2
description: This chapter explains how to connect AI agents to ROS 2 to bridge high-level planning with low-level robot control. We'll build a FastAPI server that serves as an interface between AI agents (like OpenAI's GPT models) and ROS 2 systems.
